name: Throne Room
description: This regal grand hall is supported by granite pillars. At one end of the room sits a massive stone throne, braced with iron pegs and cold steel adornments. The room is almost unbearably cold, and your breath is visible in the air. In one corner stands a suspicious statue, to the east is a door way leading into the library, and to the south is an heavy iron door that leads to the dungeons.

items.description: This muddy parchment has scribblings of mid-draft legislature.
This rust-addled blade carries an ominous aura. Who is left to tell of the countless lives this blade must have taken?
This accursed targe bears a dark weight that pulls on your arm as you wield it. It will surely defend you, but at what cost?
